contents.text:
I am Maz Koshia. I now address
the one who wishes to master a
Divine Beast...

At the four marked locations within the
Great Plateau...

If you are not up to the challenge,
leave this plateau. The weapon will
return here, and the trial will end.

To undertake this task requires
unwavering dedication.

That weapon defeats foes with one hit.
However, the reverse is also true, as its
wielder will also fall to a single strike.

You can use this weapon's ability only
twice within a set period of time...
only when it is glowing.

When enough time passes, the weapon
will regain its sheen along with its power.

defeat all monsters present to
prove your power.
